title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for describing limited growth.

Two points for comparing limited growth by referencing changes in the data over time.

title: Part B

Two points for explaining factors as to why grain farms have increased in developing countries.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for describing no effect.

Two points for explaining why rural populations in stage 5 of the demographic transition are not affected by grain yield production.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for describing total volume data is incomplete.

Two points for explaining why the total grain volume cannot be determined by data on the graph.
